info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 26 at 3:58PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern McDowell and northeastern Rutherford Counties through 430 PM EDT... At 358 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles southeast of Marion, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Rutherfordton, Spindale, Thermal City, Glenwood, Sunshine, Fero, Dysartsville, Union Mills, Green Hill and Sugar Hill. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
